sen.e: Later, the survivors of Okubo dedicated the carriage, which Okubo was riding in during the disastrous incident, to the Goryu-son-ryuin Shrine for OkuboK's soul.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: Later, Okubo's bereaved family dedicated the carriage in which he was riding at the moment of disastrous incident to the Goryu Sonryu-in Temple for the repose of his soul, and it still exists.
sen.cmt: 原文を後列と併せて一文に戻しました。「供養のため」訳漏れのため、 for the repose of his soul を追記し、全文修正して対応しました。
sen.e: Later, Okubo's bereaved family dedicated the carriage in which he was riding at the moment of disastrous incident to the Goryu Sonryu-in Temple for the repose of his soul, and it still exists.
